## ZoteroUI.addonElements property

Store elements created with this instance

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addonElements: Element[];
```

## Remarks

&gt; What is this for?

In boostrap plugins, elements must be manually maintained and removed on exiting.

This API does this for you.
